name: Word Puzzle - Connect words
summary:
Word Puzzle, a new word game with magical charm. Magical word search and combination for new challenge, guess and solve them! Word Puzzle will be easy at first, but it will get harder . It have more challenging for fun! Of course, these can be more exercise your brain, so that it will be more intelligent! 


In Word Puzzle, firstly the letters will be given in the circle board, now you need be sensitive and search your vocabulary quickly. Secondly, you should combine letters into the correct words in your brain. Finally, click the letters to put them into a crossword puzzle! Completing following three steps means that you have successfully solved a level! Don’t relax, more exciting levels are waiting for your challenge! 


-Feature -
·Many levels waiting for you to challenge.
·Word games which easy to play.
·Challenge, from simple to difficult.
·Compete with your friends and share your best scores!
·Keep your mind a fun challenge! 

We attach great importance to your feedback, you can write something in the review. Your comments will be read carefully. Besides, if you have any suggestions or questions, please contact us through FB page.

Don’t let your brain cells be defeated, win every level, and you can become the most shining words master by Word Puzzle!


NOTES
• "Word Puzzle" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like coins.
